body.p: The Templates tab specifies a list of directories where new file templates are located. These file templates are gathered from all the document types and presented in the various folders inside the Framework templates folder in the New document wizardNew from templates wizard.
To open the Templates tab of the Document type configuration dialog box, , go to Document Type Association , use the New, Edit, Duplicate, or Extend button, and click on the Templates tab.

Use the Add, Edit, and Delete buttons to add, configure, or remove templates. The Templates directory text field specifies the path to the directory of the template. It is recommended to use relative paths since absolute paths will make it difficult to share the templates with others.
You can also use wildcards in the paths for the template directories.
body.example: For example, using the following wildcard in the path would add all the template folders found inside the templates directory:${frameworkDir}/templates/*
